full_text:
Asi es la vida, si...Yeah, that't just life, baby

It's time to live a little, fer real tho, if you haven't taken a ride on this wild side...you are truly missing out. C'mon, let's go! https://t.co/y9hcGtvgWj

When the driver says, "Pedal harder." You think:
A. Awww, haaayyyykk no! 🙄
B. Where are we? 🤔
C. I gotchu! 💪
D. I'm just here for the drinks. 😇

#sprocknrollmemphis #crazynight #timetoparty #partypeople #partynight https://t.co/E5io7zwX7a

So what, it's Monday, it's never too early to weekend prep. Let's go...time to convince your friends to end the workweek with a boozin' ride 🚲, call em' out with a tag 📣 and shoot your best shot🎱! We can't wait to see this. 😜😈😄 https://t.co/j7v2uc72Sm

Pop.
Lock.
and
Sprock it.
